sentences.en: A person discovered committing an offense may be summoned verbally.
sentences.cn: 对于当场发现的违反治安管理的人,可以口头传唤.

sentences.en: By the age of two most children have begun to communicate verbally.
sentences.cn: 大多数孩子两岁时就开始用说话沟通.

sentences.en: He alleged that he was verbally abused by other soldiers.
sentences.cn: 他宣称自己遭到其他士兵的辱骂。

sentences.en: He couldn't put his feelings into words, ie express them verbally.
sentences.cn: 他无法把自己的感情用言语说清楚.

sentences.en: He verbally laced into his son for his misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 他严厉斥责儿子的行为不端.

sentences.en: I will communicate your views verbally to the members of the committee.
sentences.cn: 我会将你的看法口头转达给委员会成员.

sentences.en: In the book she speaks of his "social ineptitude" and says he verbally abused her.
sentences.cn: 她在书中提到他“缺乏社交技能”，并且说他曾经对她出言不逊。

sentences.en: Information is given to the patient verbally and in writing.
sentences.cn: 用口头和书面的形式向病人提供信息。

sentences.en: One can express his feeling and ideas both orally and verbally.
sentences.cn: 人们可用口头或书面来表达自己的感情与思想.

sentences.en: Stewart has developed a tendency to mix it verbally with the opposition.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特现在变得只要和别人意见不合，就准备大吵一架。

sentences.en: Teachers were threatened with kitchen knives, physically assaulted and verbally abused..
sentences.cn: .老师们被人用菜刀威胁，遭受人身侵犯和言语辱骂。

sentences.en: The company had received complaints both verbally and in writing.
sentences.cn: 这家公司收到了口头和书面的投诉。

sentences.en: Twins often have difficulty expressing themselves verbally.
sentences.cn: 双胞胎往往有言语表达方面的困难。

sentences.en: We are constantly expressing our beliefs both verbally and through our actions.
sentences.cn: 我们总是通过语言和行动来表达自己的信念.

sentences.en: You may answer either verbally or in writing.
sentences.cn: 你以口头或书面回答都可以.
